import { useReducer } from 'react' import './App.css' import DigitButton from './DigitButton.js' export const ACTIONS = { ADD_DIGIT: 'add-digits', CHOOSE_OPERATION: 'choose-operation', CLEAR: 'clear', DELETE_DIGIT: 'delete-digits', EVALUATE: 'evaluate' } function App () { const [{ currentOperand, previousOperand, operator }, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, {}) return (
{previousOperand} {operator}
{currentOperand}
) } export default App
